data.text: @NellyTheHatt @craig4nwarks @DamonPBrown He replied via email instantly for this request

@KillerTermite @DamonPBrown @craig4nwarks Absolutely if the council are stating the venue is closed for another year to ensure public health needs are met - I question why we can’t book in there @CWPT_NHS @CWCCG

@nicnacs @DamonPBrown @craig4nwarks I waited a extra 6 weeks to get in there so I didn’t have to travel to Warwick at the time and even then it was a ‘open day’.

They also lost the evidence I had my second one so the nhs thinks I have had 1 which might be a problem when I travel
@craig4nwarks @nicnacs @DamonPBrown Good luck. I emailed Mr Tracey on 14/02/22, still no response…
@craig4nwarks @DamonPBrown Thank you Craig will do now
@nicnacs @DamonPBrown Drop me an email and I will look into for you

@Mair_SarahJF @DamonPBrown @craig4nwarks Terrible isn’t it trying to ensure we get the vaccines done in timely manner and in local area I mean @CllrKrisWilson stated he puts public health over panto however can’t even book a vaccine in ready time which is a major aspect of the public health agenda
@nicnacs @DamonPBrown @craig4nwarks We are having the same issue x
